mapper.sql: id, menuCode, menuUrl, menuName, menuLevel, isLeafNode, parentId, menuImgPath, menuDesc, created, createdby, updated, updatedby, status
mapper.insert: insert into bs_resource (id, menuCode, menuUrl, menuName, menuLevel, isLeafNode, parentId, menuImgPath, menuDesc, created, createdby, updated, updatedby, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menulevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isleafnode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuimgpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menudesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createdby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updated,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updatedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update bs_resource
menuCode = #{menucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menuUrl = #{menuurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menuName = #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menuLevel = #{menulevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isLeafNode = #{isleafnode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
menuImgPath = #{menuimgpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menuDesc = #{menudesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=DATE},
createdby = #{createdby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=DATE},
updatedby = #{updatedby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bs_resource set menuCode = #{menucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menuUrl = #{menuurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menuName = #{menuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menuLevel = #{menulevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isLeafNode = #{isleafnode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menuImgPath = #{menuimgpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menuDesc = #{menudesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=DATE}, createdby = #{createdby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=DATE}, updatedby = #{updatedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, menuCode, menuUrl, menuName, menuLevel, isLeafNode, case isLeafNode WHEN 1 THEN '是' WHEN 0 THEN '否' end as LeafNode, parentId, menuImgPath, menuDesc, created, createdby, updated, updatedby, status from bs_resource where parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = 1
